title:
Last night I watched a fire truck with lights flashing creep through an intersection. Why do they not have a switch to turn the lights green in their direction?  Also this column recently said the city is upgrading the light system and is this part of the upgrade?

Most cities give the ability to control the lights to their police and fire vehicles.
